### Using the Connection to Access Data

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(dbplyr)
library(sparklyr)

sc <- spark_connect(
    cluster_id = "1026-175310-7cpsh3g8",
    method = "databricks_connect"
)
```


```{r}
trips <- tbl(sc, in_catalog("samples", "nyctaxi", "trips"))

trips
```



```{r}
trips %>%
  group_by(pickup_zip) %>%
  summarise(
    count = n(),
    avg_distance = mean(trip_distance, na.rm = TRUE)
  )
```

```{r}
spark_disconnect(sc)
```
